Unitron/Firestarter/Sixshot/Ares/Serpentor/Double Punch/Manterror/Bumblebee/
Injector:



The nine robots began to converse freely, a jamming singal eminating from a 
device on a table that blocked all cameras and listening devices in one of 
the rooms in the Alliance base.
